title: Bug 4971: Unexpected package 'ui' created after copying package
description: Bug 4971: When using the 'copy package' feature in Eclipse JDT UI, a package named 'ui' is unexpectedly created in the destination folder. This issue can be reproduced as follows:
OB: After using the 'copy package' feature, the destination folder contains a new package named 'ui'.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse JDT UI.
2. Navigate to the package 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
3. Right-click on the package and select 'Copy Package'.
4. Choose the destination for the copied package.
5. Check the destination folder for the existence of the package 'ui'.
